fields.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
A unique identifier for the Document Delivery Type.
Workday requires you to set 1 document delivery type as default and you must specify all document types available for a given delivery method.
A unique name for the Document Delivery Type. This field is required and must have a value.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
The reference to the Document associated with the Document Delivery Type. The document can be a Customer Invoice, Customer Statement, or Dunning Letter. This field is required and must have a value.
A flag when set to true, prevents you from adding an inactive delivery type to a customer profile. But you can update the delivery type.

Default_Delivery_Type.description: Workday requires you to set 1 document delivery type as default and you must specify all document types available for a given delivery method.

Delivery_Method_Reference_Delivery_Metho.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Delivery_Method_Reference_WID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Delivery_Type_Name.description: A unique name for the Document Delivery Type. This field is required and must have a value.

Document_Delivery_Type_Reference_Documen.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Document_Delivery_Type_Reference_WID.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Document_Type_Reference.description: The reference to the Document associated with the Document Delivery Type. The document can be a Customer Invoice, Customer Statement, or Dunning Letter. This field is required and must have a value.

ID.description: A unique identifier for the Document Delivery Type.

Inactive.description: A flag when set to true, prevents you from adding an inactive delivery type to a customer profile. But you can update the delivery type.
